files.patch:
@@ -1638,0 +1638,1 @@
+
@@ -1640,1 +1641,0 @@
-
@@ -1650,0 +1650,1 @@
+// We should never be trying to set a field of an attaching thread.
@@ -1653,2 +1654,2 @@
-    if (holder != nullptr)                                      \
-      java_lang_Thread_FieldHolder::set_##field(holder, value); \
+    assert(holder != nullptr, "Thread not fully initialized");  \
+    java_lang_Thread_FieldHolder::set_##field(holder, value);   \
